clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of Metronidazole, Nystatin and Dexamethasone Combination Therapy in Bacterial and Fungal Vaginal Infections
clinical_study.official_title: Single Blind Randomized Study of Efficacy and Safety of Vaginal Cream With Association of Metronidazole, Nystatin and Dexamethasone in the Treatment of Bacterial and Fungal Vaginal Infections

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of association of metronidazole, nystatin and dexamethasone in the treatment of bacterial and fungal vaginal infections.

primary_outcome.description: Therapeutic cure which is based on a combination of clinical outcome and Gram's stain results (Nugentscore)/mycological eradication.

secondary_outcome.description: Time resolution of symptoms; percentage of patients with Nugent score between 0-3; negative fungal culture; and subjective assessment of patients on the intensity of vulvar itching.
